content.question: Using the substitution <math alttext="u equals, 4 x, minus 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, x times, open parenthesis, 4 x, minus 3, close parenthesis, to the tenth power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> is equivalent to which of the following?

choices.label: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, u to the tenth power, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one fourth times, the indefinite integral of, u to the tenth power, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one fourth times, the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, u to the eleventh power, plus, 3 times u to the tenth power, close parenthesis, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one sixteenth times, the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, u to the eleventh power, plus, 3 times u to the tenth power, close parenthesis, times, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one sixteenth times, the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, u to the eleventh power, plus, 3 times u to the tenth power, close parenthesis, times, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
